A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this was pobably the last star wars that I will sit through. There were many problems with this movie. The humor took all of the tension out of some pretty big scenes. Many characters were not developed fully and were killed off for no reason. Too many unbelievable\, and convenient escapes from danger.  Pacing was off.  The whole movie felt pointless\, and really disappointing as a whole.\n\nThe fight scenes were cool and Kylo and Rey were incredible! Mark hamill was great\, but they completely ruined Luke Skywalker.
